document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Too </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">happy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">Time </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">dissolves </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">itself </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">leaves </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">no </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">remnant </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'Tis </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7078ff">Anguish </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">Feather </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">hath </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">too </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">much </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">weight </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">fly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Too happy time dissolves itself
